mapper.select: select u.id, u.email, u.name, u.nickname, u.website, u.profilephoto, u.intro, p.postCount, lf.isFollow, ub.isBlock from (SELECT id, email, name, nickname, website, profilephoto, intro FROM tbl_user WHERE nickname=#{nickname}) u left join (select count(*) as postCount, userid from tbl_post group by userid) p on u.id=p.userid left join (SELECT followedid as isFollow FROM tbl_follow WHERE userid=#{loginid}) lf on lf.isFollow=u.id left join (select u.id, count(*) as isBlock from faint.tbl_block b join (select id from faint.tbl_user where nickname=#{nickname}) u on u.id=b.userid and blockedid=#{loginid}) ub on u.id=ub.id;
SELECT * FROM tbl_user WHERE id>0 ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT DISTINCT uf.*, lf.isFollow, ub.isBlock from (SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, u.nickname, u.profilephoto, u.intro FROM tbl_user u join tbl_follow f ON f.followedid=u.id and f.userid=#{userid}) uf left join (SELECT followedid as isFollow FROM tbl_follow WHERE userid=#{loginid}) lf on lf.isFollow=uf.id left join (select userid from tbl_block where blockedid=#{loginid}) ub on uf.id = ub.userid where ub.userid is null;
